GrandCanyonSandbaR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Plot an Interactive Hydrograph

    plotInteractiveHydrograph.Rd

    Creates an interactive hydrograph using the dygraphs package. This function is designed to plot time series data of water discharge, allowing for the specification of units in cubic feet per second (cfs) or cubic meters per second (cms). Additional parameters allow for customization of the plot title and subtitle.

    plotInteractiveHydrograph(
  Qdat,
  title = "Hydrograph",
  subtitle = "subtitle",
  unit = "cfs"
)

    Arguments

    Qdat

    A time series object (preferably an xts object) containing the discharge data to be plotted.

    title

    The main title of the hydrograph plot. Default is "Hydrograph".

    subtitle

    The subtitle of the hydrograph plot, typically used for specifying the date range or other descriptive information. Default is "subtitle".

    unit

    A character string specifying the unit of the discharge data. Supported units are 'cfs' for cubic feet per second and 'cms' for cubic meters per second. Default is 'cfs'.

    Value

    An interactive hydrograph plot rendered using dygraphs.

    Examples

    if (FALSE) {
data("SampleQ_xts_cfs")
plotInteractiveHydrograph(Qdat = SampleQ_xts_cfs,
  title= "Colorado River Discharge at Lees Ferry",
  subtitle = "October 3rd 2014 - October 11th 2014")
}
